attributes.action: REGULATION TO STOP `POLICE OFFICERS` WITH CRIMINAL RECORDS REMAINING AS OFFICERS.
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT `REGULATIONS` THAT PREVENT `POLICE OFFICERS` FROM REMAINING AS OFFICERS WITH SERIOUS `CRIMINAL RECORDS`, THIS WOULD STOP CRIMINALS CATCHING CRIMINALS AND THEM BEING `BIAS` DUE TO THERE CONVICTIONS, THE POLICE SHOULD BE LOOKED UP TO AND HAVE RESPECT, AT THIS TIME HOW CAN ANYONE RESPECT SOMEONE WHO MAY BE CRIMINAL THEMSELVES, THIS WOULD KEEP THINGS ON THE JUSTICE SIDE FOR ALL, THEY SHOULD BE DISMISSED FOR ANY WRONG DOING, THIS WOULD MAKE THEM THINK BEFORE BREAKING THE LAWS THEM SELVES, JUSTICE FOR ALL.
